Detailed Description

Functions which perform the flat field correction.

Function Documentation

static float flatfield ( float  fg,
float  bg,
float  dc = 0.0 
) [inline, static]

Performs the flat image subtraction.

Would be used only as the blitz::Array function.

Parameters:
fgforeground intensity.
bgbackground intensity.
dcdark current intensity.
Returns:
intensity of the pixel with the subtracted background.
